title: Community Values
description: The principles that guide our community and shape our interactions

welcome.title: Welcome to DSML Kazakhstan
welcome.intro: We are a vibrant community of Data Science and Machine Learning enthusiasts in Kazakhstan. Our mission is to foster learning, innovation, and collaboration in the field of artificial intelligence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create an inclusive environment where everyone can learn, grow, and contribute to the advancement of AI and ML in Kazakhstan.

community.title: Our Community
community.description: We bring together students, professionals, researchers, and enthusiasts from all backgrounds and experience levels.

guidelines.title: Content Guidelines
guidelines.relevant: Keep discussions relevant to Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, or related topics
guidelines.respectful: Maintain respectful and professional communication at all times
guidelines.constructive: Provide constructive feedback and engage in meaningful discussions
guidelines.original: Share original content and properly attribute sources when sharing others' work

prohibited.title: Prohibited Content
prohibited.offtopic: Off-topic discussions unrelated to our community focus

process.title: Moderation Process
process.description: We maintain a fair and transparent moderation process to ensure our community remains welcoming and productive for everyone.

steps.permanent: Severe or continued violations: Permanent ban

respect.title: Respectful Communication
respect.description: We value respectful dialogue and constructive exchange of opinions among all community members.

newcomers.title: Support for Newcomers
newcomers.description: We actively help and guide those who are just starting their journey in AI and machine learning.

innovation.title: Fostering Innovation Culture
innovation.description: Through olympiads, research seminars, and scientific articles, we develop innovation and academic excellence.

celebration.title: Celebrating Our Successes
celebration.description: We share and congratulate our residents on their small successes and achievements.

meetings.title: Live Non-Anonymous Communication
meetings.description: Support for weekly meetings in major cities of Kazakhstan and the world to create real connections.

interests.title: Common Interests Beyond AI
interests.description: Games, books, anime, football, movies, real estate - we share diverse interests that enrich our community.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.description: Ready to be part of Kazakhstan's leading Data Science and Machine Learning community? Join us today and start your journey!
